snippet: Political activists asked a new inspector general for the New York Police Department on Tuesday to force police officials to fully disclose details about how undercover officers sought to secretly infiltrate and monitor liberal activist groups....

headline.print_headline: NYPD Surveillance of Political Activism Questioned
headline.main: NYPD Surveillance of Political Activism Questioned

lead_paragraph: Political activists asked a new inspector general for the New York Police Department on Tuesday to force police officials to fully disclose details about how undercover officers sought to secretly infiltrate and monitor liberal activist groups.
